title: Aria the OVA: Arietta
synopsis: Akari Mizunashi dreams of life after attaining her goal of becoming a Prima Undine, but upon waking realizes that she might not actually have the confidence to run Aria Company on her own. Wary of the future, she seeks advice from her mentor Alicia Florenceâ€”one of the three great "Water Fairies" of Neo-Venezia.
